targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	$__timeGroup(date, $degradation_period) AS time,
	convert_km((sum([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level,battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') 
	* ($battery_capacity + ($battery_capacity * $degradation / 100.0)) / $max_range AS "kWh"
FROM
	(
    SELECT 
      battery_level, usable_battery_level, date, rated_battery_range_km, ideal_battery_range_km, outside_temp
    FROM positions
    WHERE
      car_id = $car_id 
      AND $__timeFilter(date) 
      AND ideal_battery_range_km is not null
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 
      battery_level, coalesce(usable_battery_level,battery_level) as usable_battery_level, date, 
      rated_battery_range_km, ideal_battery_range_km, outside_temp
    FROM charges c
    JOIN
      charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
    where
      $__timeFilter(date) 
      AND p.car_id = $car_id
    ) AS data
GROUP BY 1
HAVING 
  convert_km((sum([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level,battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1, 2  DESC

WITH charge AS (
  SELECT
  	sum(charge_energy_added) AS total_energy
  FROM
  	charging_processes
  WHERE
  	car_id = $car_id
)

SELECT  
  total_energy / ($battery_capacity * (1 + ($degradation / 100))) AS ciclos
FROM charge

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

(
  SELECT date, usable_battery_level * $battery_capacity / 100 as kWh
  FROM positions
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
UNION
SELECT date, usable_battery_level * $battery_capacity / 100 as kWh
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current,
		cp.charge_energy_used
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

(SELECT usable_battery_level, date
  FROM positions
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
UNION
  SELECT usable_battery_level, date
  FROM charges c
  JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
  WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND p.car_id = $car_id
  ORDER BY date DESC
  LIMIT 1

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_used)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	( SUM(charge_energy_added) * 100 / SUM(charge_energy_used) )
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

select convert_km(odometer::numeric, '$length_unit')  as "odometer_$length_unit"
from positions 
where car_id = $car_id 
order by date desc 
limit 1;

SELECT $__time(date), range as "range_$length_unit"
FROM (
	(SELECT date, convert_km(rated_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id AND rated_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
	UNION ALL
	(SELECT date, convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range
	FROM charges c
	JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE p.car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
) AS data
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT $__time(date), (range * 100.0 / battery_level) as "max_range_$length_unit"
FROM (
	(SELECT date, convert_km(rated_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range, usable_battery_level as battery_level
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id AND rated_battery_range_km IS NOT NULL
  ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
	UNION ALL
	(SELECT date, convert_km([[preferred_range]]_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range, usable_battery_level as battery_level
	FROM charges c
	JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE p.car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY date DESC
	LIMIT 1)
) AS data
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 1;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
WITH lastCharges AS (
	SELECT (100.0 * charge_energy_added) / (end_battery_level - start_battery_level)
	FROM charging_processes
	WHERE 
		charge_energy_added >= 10
		AND car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY end_date DESC
	LIMIT 5
)
SELECT * FROM lastCharges 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1
list.name: battery_capacity
list.query:
WITH lastCharges AS (
	SELECT (100.0 * charge_energy_added) / (end_battery_level - start_battery_level)
	FROM charging_processes
	WHERE 
		charge_energy_added >= 10
		AND car_id = $car_id
	ORDER BY end_date DESC
	LIMIT 5
)
SELECT * FROM lastCharges 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 1

list.definition:
SELECT AVG(data.degradation) FROM
(
	SELECT 100 - convert_km(((end_rated_range_km * 100.0)/(end_battery_level * $max_range / 100.0)), '$length_unit')::float as degradation
	FROM charging_processes 
	WHERE 
		car_id = $car_id 
		AND end_date IS NOT NULL 
		AND charge_energy_added > 10 
	ORDER BY end_date DESC  
	LIMIT 5
) AS data
list.name: degradation
list.query:
SELECT AVG(data.degradation) FROM
(
	SELECT 100 - convert_km(((end_rated_range_km * 100.0)/(end_battery_level * $max_range / 100.0)), '$length_unit')::float as degradation
	FROM charging_processes 
	WHERE 
		car_id = $car_id 
		AND end_date IS NOT NULL 
		AND charge_energy_added > 10 
	ORDER BY end_date DESC  
	LIMIT 5
) AS data

list.definition:
WITH projected_range AS (
	SELECT
		$__timeGroup(date, 1d) AS time,
		convert_km((sum(rated_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') AS "Projected rated range [$length_unit]"
	FROM
		(
			SELECT 
				battery_level, usable_battery_level, date, rated_battery_range_km
    		FROM positions
    		WHERE
				car_id = $car_id
				AND ideal_battery_range_km IS NOT null
    		UNION ALL
    			SELECT 
					battery_level, coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level) as usable_battery_level, date, rated_battery_range_km
		    	FROM charges c
    			JOIN
      				charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
    			WHERE
       				p.car_id = $car_id
    	) AS data
	GROUP BY 1
	HAVING convert_km((sum(rated_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') IS NOT null
	ORDER BY 2 DESC
	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT "Projected rated range [$length_unit]" FROM projected_range
list.name: max_range
list.query:
WITH projected_range AS (
	SELECT
		$__timeGroup(date, 1d) AS time,
		convert_km((sum(rated_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') AS "Projected rated range [$length_unit]"
	FROM
		(
			SELECT 
				battery_level, usable_battery_level, date, rated_battery_range_km
    		FROM positions
    		WHERE
				car_id = $car_id
				AND ideal_battery_range_km IS NOT null
    		UNION ALL
    			SELECT 
					battery_level, coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level) as usable_battery_level, date, rated_battery_range_km
		    	FROM charges c
    			JOIN
      				charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
    			WHERE
       				p.car_id = $car_id
    	) AS data
	GROUP BY 1
	HAVING convert_km((sum(rated_battery_range_km) / nullif(sum(coalesce(usable_battery_level, battery_level)),0) * 100)::numeric, '$length_unit') IS NOT null
	ORDER BY 2 DESC
	LIMIT 1
)
SELECT "Projected rated range [$length_unit]" FROM projected_range

list.label: Period for the calculation of degradation
list.name: degradation_period
